means: 使用模棱两可的话隐瞒真相
躲闪；推诿；含糊其词；说话支吾，态度暧昧

sentence.Network_en: Don't equivocate with me I want a straight answer to a straight question!
sentence.Network_cn: 别跟我绕弯子--我问的问题直截了当,回答也要直截了当!

sentence.Network_en: You can tell when they're stressed out, they'll equivocate and vacillate.
sentence.Network_cn: 当他们压力过大时,你是可以辨别出来的, 因为他们会支支吾吾、犹豫不决.

sentence.Network_en: They waver while the latter stand firm, they equivocate while the latter are forthright.
sentence.Network_cn: 前者动摇,后者坚定, 前者暧昧,后者明朗.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 支字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 支使〖 orderabout〗 支吾〖 prevaricate;equivocate〗 支吾其词〖 prevaricate〗.
最新GMAT词汇精选 - 豆丁网 ... equitable adj． 公平的，公正的 equivocate v． 模棱两可地说,支吾其词 eradicate v． 根除，扑灭.
英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... convoke 召集 equivocate 蒙混,闪烁其词,推托 evoke 引起.
英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... convoke 召集 equivocate 蒙混,闪烁其词,推托 evoke 引起.

list.abs: 沪江词库精选equivocal是什么意思、英语单词推荐、用法及解释、中英文句子翻译、... equivocal surface 模糊曲面  equivocal symptom 非特征性症状  equivocal的例句.
They waver while the latter stand firm , they equivocate while the latter forthright ., 前者动摇 , 后者坚定 , 前者暧昧 , 后者明朗.
the officer ' s equivocal behavior increased the victim ' s uneasiness ;, 政府官员暧昧的行为增加了受害人的不安;
The experiments produced equivocal results ., 这些实验产生的结果难以理解.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'use a word in more than one sense'): from late Latin aequivocat- 'called by the same name', from the verb aequivocare, from aequivocus (see equivocal)

entry.tran: 含糊其词;说模棱两可的话
entry.def: When someone equivocates, they deliberately use vague language in order to deceive people or to avoid speaking the truth.

example.ex: He is equivocating a lot about what is going to happen if and when there are elections...
example.tran: 他支支吾吾地说着很多万一进行选举会发生的状况。

example.ex: He had asked her once again about her finances. And again she had equivocated.
example.tran: 他又一次询问她的财务状况，她再次含糊其词。

means.word_mean: 1. be deliberately ambiguous or unclear in order to mislead or withhold information

auth_sentence.content: Truth is truth, only devious people seek to equivocate it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Truth is truth, only devious people seek to equivocate it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Truth is truth, only devious people seek to equivocate it.

auth_sentence.content: We always equivocate on this, and redefine our "nothingnesses" to suite the context.
auth_sentence.res_content: We always equivocate on this, and redefine our "nothingnesses" to suite the context.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We always equivocate on this, and redefine our "nothingnesses" to suite the context.

auth_sentence.content: History vindicates, of course, but it can equally condemn, ignore, equivocate.
auth_sentence.res_content: History vindicates, of course, but it can equally condemn, ignore, equivocate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: History vindicates, of course, but it can equally condemn, ignore, equivocate.

stems_affixes.word_buile: equi平等+vocal[adj.声音的;有声的;歌唱的]→两种声音的,听不清楚的→意义含糊的
ir不+revocable可取消的→adj.不可取消的
voci=voc出声,叫喊,看+fer带来+ous……的→带来声音的→喧闹的
advocate拥护+or人→n.拥护者, 提倡者
voc出声,叫喊,看+able能……的→能发出声的→词
vocabul=vocable[n.[无义]词, 词外壳]+ary表名词→n.词汇,词汇量;词汇表
voc出声,叫喊,看+al表名词→n.元音;声乐作品
vocal[adj.声音的;有声的;歌唱的]+ist人→n.流行歌手,声乐家

stems_affixes.value_cn: 职业;召唤;天命;天职;才能
stems_affixes.word_buile: voc出声,叫喊,看+ation表名词→[受到]召唤→天职;职业
vow=voc出声,叫喊,看+el表名词→n.元音；元音字母
con共同+voc出声,叫喊,看+ation表名词→n.召集,会议
ad加强+voc出声,叫喊,看+ate表动词→增强声音→拥护
equi平等+voc出声,叫喊,看+ate表动词→两种声音听不清楚→支吾其词
